snippet.title: 7Days Origins Gameplay
snippet.description:
Every choice you make will change your story. Every small choice will change your relationships with comrades, and change your fate and those of your comrades at critical moments. You may be the villain, or a trustworthy comrade. Everything depends on your choices.

This is a place for those who gather to receive a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity in the structure of time. Members sometimes become friends, and sometimes turn out to be enemies in order to finish their own assignment.
Kirel, our amnesiac protagonist who has forgotten even his own name is put on a test.
Everything depends on your choice.
You only have 7 days!
And what would be your choice?
💳--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1494140/7Days_Origins/

🖱️  --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Always playing/testing the latest games from first impressions, game tips and occasionally walkthroughs. So if your new to the channel don't forget to 👊🏻 the like button and supporting this channel by subscribing.
✨ --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Also never miss the latest games by turning on the notification button.
